content: TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer Versatile SDS Plus cordless rotary hammer with wide drilling range, chipping function and quick-change chuck (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Performance, versatility and ergonomics in one – the TE 6-22 cordless rotary hammer has a wide drilling range, chiseling function and more comfort for all-day use Helps reduce fatigue – now even lighter, helping you power through larger concrete drilling jobs Improved handling – better tool balance and contoured grips so you can drill, chip or drive more comfortably in any position Comprehensive safety features – includes Active Torque Control (ATC) to better protect you from uncontrolled spinning if the bit sticks Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity Applications Drilling and hammer drilling in concrete and masonry Virtually dust-free drilling (TE DRS-4/6 on-board dust removal system or TE DRS-C vacuum cleaner connector required) Light-duty chiseling – such as tile scraping, channel cleaning or surface correction Occasional drilling in wood and steel (with optional quick-release chuck) Setting anchors and drop-in anchors (with optional TE-C bit holder) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 6.3 lb. Optimum Hammer drilling range: 1/4 - 23/32 in Single impact energy: 1.9 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 6.3 lb | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 1/4 - 23/32 in | Single impact energy | 1.9 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling diameter range | 5/32 - 1-3/32 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 1050 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 5100 impacts/minute | Functionality | Active Torque Control (ATC), Active Vibration Reduction (AVR), Chiseling, Chipping, Depth gauge, Removable chuck, Reverse mode, Torque clutch | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 5.5 m/s² | 1 | A-weighted emission sound power level | 102 dB (A) | 2 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 94 dB (A) | 3 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-4/6, TE DRS-C, TE DRS-D | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3951586 - TE 6-22 Performance Package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 6-22 05 Cordless rotary hammer - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE-CX 3/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4- 4 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 5/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x Flat chisel TE-CX FM 18 - 1x Pointed chisel TE-CX SM 18 - 2253085 - Cordless Rotary Hammer TE 6-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 6-22 05 Cordless rotary hammer - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
